title: First Look at Helium 10 for KDP Niche Research
description:
✅  Click This Link to Take a Look at Helium 10 https://publisherreport.com/h10

But what does a high priced full feature tool like Helium 10 add to the process for us self-publishers trying to make it work on Amazon?
